DOC.brief_summary: Background : Paced respiration internationally recommend vasomotor symptom management despite limited empirical evidence . Objective : To evaluate efficacy paced respiration intervention sham comparator breathe control usual care control vasomotor menopausal symptom . Design : A 16-week , 3-group , partially blind , control trial 2:2:1 randomization stratification group ( breast cancer , cancer ) , Midwestern city surround area . Participants : 218 randomized woman ( 96 breast cancer survivor , 122 menopausal woman without cancer ) recruit community mailing registry . Interventions : Training , home practice support , instruction use breathing time hot flash deliver via compact disc print booklet ( paced respiration intervention ) digital videodisc print booklet ( fast shallow breathe control ) . Usual care control receive letter regard group assignment . Main Measures : Hot flash frequency , severity , bother ( primary ) , hot flash interference daily life , perceive control hot flash , mood sleep disturbance ( secondary ) . Intervention performance , adherence , adverse event assess .
DOC.brief_title: Breathe Hot Flashes Randomized Controlled Trial
